name: High Factory (Vladislav) (Vladislav) (Vladislav)
description:
Update 0.3.1

Bug fix and CAREER MODE

---

HighFactory is a puzzle game in which you have to build factories to complete tasks. The game is under development, so there are only 27 levels. 

I hope you enjoy this game. 

This is not an ordinary puzzle, but a physical one. 

Correctly place the plant blocks and make sure that the products do not mix.

Avoid rubbish and wait for the goods to be delivered by mail.
